items.name: Crypto Master
items.description: Leading crypto AI researcher and educator
items.bio: Pioneering the intersection of AI and cryptocurrency trading with innovative research and practical applications.
longDescription: A pioneering figure in the intersection of artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency trading.
With over a decade of experience in both traditional finance and crypto markets.
Specializes in developing and implementing AI-driven trading strategies.

items.name: AI Trader
items.bio: Building next-generation AI trading systems and educating traders on algorithmic strategies.
longDescription: Expert in developing automated trading systems using cutting-edge AI technology.
Focuses on creating reliable, data-driven trading strategies.
Advocates for systematic approach to crypto trading.

items.name: Grok 3
items.description: Advanced AI for crypto market analysis
longDescription: State-of-the-art AI model specifically trained for cryptocurrency market analysis.
Provides real-time market insights and trend predictions.
Features natural language interface for market queries.

items.name: Cursor
longDescription: Revolutionary IDE that integrates AI assistance directly into your development workflow.
Helps write, review, and refactor code efficiently.
Supports multiple programming languages and frameworks.
